body:
The theorem of a good enough parent says that if your reactions to your childâ€™s needs == empathic in > 50% cases


	then:  


	you = good enough parent


Fact: I learned very soon to hide all my needs for fear of upsetting you.

choices.label: 1) You can just say it out loud, that I was a terrible mother.
2) This is not useful for either of us. Are you aware of that?
